DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the portion of the product that was manipulated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A thing produced by or resulting from a process. EXAMPLE(S): drug, device. The FDA list of regulated products: animal and human drugs; therapeutic biologics; allergenics; cell, tissue and gene therapy products; blood components; blood derivative products; devices; and animal (pets and livestock) and human food/feed (medicated and un-medicated); cosmetics; pet treats; and dietary supplements._A change resulting in something that is different from the original._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A change resulting in something that is different from the original.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The act or process of modifying something.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released. 11/01/2021 KMM; DEC def contains gene therapy/ CDEs uses the BRIDG 3.0.3 definition for product per Janet.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole._A change resulting in something that is different from the original._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.:A change resulting in something that is different from the original.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole.
The act or process of modifying something.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
